attributes.action: INDEPENDENT investigation into Royal Mail sell off  - and reverse the sell off
attributes.additional_details:
Instigate an independent (FREE of parliamentary interference) investigation into the Royal Mail sell off, and halt/reverse the sell off .
It's very clear that the Royal Mail has been massively under valued and the way the sell off was handled needs thorough investigation - the taxpayer will get know where near it's TRUE value, while at the same time have to be totally liable for the pension fund .
